channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: If Rogue Judges Keep Thwarting The People’s Will, Congress Should Abolish Judgeships
item.description: It’s time to put rogue judges on notice: If you keep blocking the will of the people, Congress will pull your chair out from under you.

item.title: Exclusive: Lawmakers Call On USDA To End Biden Era Discriminatory Policies Against White Farmers
item.description: 'Each day without reform further disadvantages farmers ... based on their immutable characteristics,' Wisconsin congressmen wrote..

item.title: California Seeks Federal Funding for the ‘Worst New Transit Project in the U.S.’
item.description: The new FTA administrator has a chance to do the taxpayers and commuters who live and work in the Santa Clara Valley a big favor.

item.title: How Trump’s Covid-Era Tariff Policy Could Help Small Businesses Like Mine Reshore
item.description: Small businesses reliant on imports often lack the financial capacity to absorb steep tariffs on the goods they need to survive.

item.title: House Republicans take step closer to banning congressional stock trading
item.description: Congressional Republicans have introduced legislation banning lawmakers from stock trading in both the House and Senate as of Wednesday.

item.description: Jake, I think you should leave.

item.title: Trump’s China Climbdown
item.description: Let’s hope the president continues to reverse his colossal trade war error.

item.title: New poll says Democrats are deeply pessimistic about the future of their party: ‘I just feel like the majority of the old Democratic Party needs to go’
item.description: “They’re not in tune with the new generation," said Monica Brown, a Democrat from Tennessee. "We’ve got such division within the party.”

item.title: We Shouldn’t ‘Emergency’ Our Way Around the Constitution
item.description: Sorry, there’s no invasion.
